longBusinessSummary: Homasote Company manufactures and sells building and industrial wood products for the construction and manufacturing industries in the United States. The company provides 440 SoundBarrier for wall and floor sound insulation; Easy-ply and Firestall for roof decking; 4-Way and ComfortBase for floor deckings; Homex 300, Homasote ICE DECK, and N.C.F.R. Homasote for concrete expansion joints and forming boards; and DesignWall, NovaCork, and PINnacle for finished interior panels. It offers various shapes and coated strips for product separation and breakage reduction that protects customer's products during interplant transport for use in glass, paper, and metal industries; and packaging products under the PAK-LINE and STAPLE-SAFE brands to end-users, appliance manufacturers, and office furniture makers. The company's products are used in various applications, such as sound control, basement and concrete slab conversions, cathedral ceilings, fire-rated products, concrete forming, decorative/tackable panels, floors, floor and surface protection, hobbies, house and workshops, ice rink conversions, multiple family dwellings, roofs and ceilings, shock absorptions, thermal insulations, and walls. It serves building material wholesalers and contractors, and industrial manufacturers. It exports its products to Canada and internationally. Homasote Company was incorporated in 1909 and is based in West Trenton, New Jersey.
